Thomas Middleton

  1. Foster Name: Thomas Leonard
  2. Foster Family: Leonard Francis and Florence Gibbons Sherlock
  3. Location of Family: Emerson, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Omaha, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 1910-02-15, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 2022-03-12
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: 1920 United States Federal Census; 1930 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex; The Wakefield Republican, 21 March 2002; Nebraska Journal Leader Ponca, 14 March 2002.
